Posts Forms Module¶

class posts.forms.PostForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]¶

Bases: ModelForm

This class will represent a Form for creating and updating Post objects.

Fields:

  • title: The title name of the post

  • content: The content of the post stored in a TextField

Meta class:

  • Defines the model to use the Post object and the fields

included in the form.

class Meta[source]¶

Bases: object

fields = ['title', 'content', 'author']¶
